name: Hungry Hungry Cell
description:
CLICK the location on the screen where you want to move to.

Press ENTER to pause.

Lucas is determined  to grow stronger and needs your help.

Play as Lucas, a courageous white blood cell fighting to keep the body safe.

Survive and become as big as possible by absorbing the smaller cells.

Win by becoming the biggest among them all.

Be warned, You can only absorb cells that are smaller than you.

If it has the guts to chase you when you get close to it...

Even while you are slightly bigger...

It means it is still powerful enough to absorb you.

If that happens, I urge you to escape and absorb other smaller cells.

You'll know you've reached the right size when nobody tries to mess with you!

Oh! I almost forgot... You become slower as you grow bigger!
